description: Observations to London Borough of Camden in connection with the erection of a seven storey building with basement to provide a hotel with 167 bedrooms (Class C1) with reception off Crestfield Street and ancillary bar/restaurant in basement; commercial floorspace on ground floor for flexible retail (Class A12), financial/professional services (C lass A2) and restaurant/cafe (Class A3) uses on Euston Road frontage; seven residential units (six x 2-bed, one x 3-bed Class C3) on Birkenhead Street; plus associated highway and hard landscaping works (following the demolition of existing buildings).
